wiki.content:
This is the best song to describe most working enviroments. If you talk to someone too long or more than a few times then......you are talked about....I LOVE IT!

wiki.summary: This is the best song to describe most working enviroments. If you talk to someone too long or more than a few times then......you are talked about....I LOVE IT!

track.name: Something To Talk About
comments: Still lovin' her. Talk about it.
So glad people decided to upload good music like this song... love her!
****THANK YOU AVERY****
This sounds different than her version on Luck of the Draw. Still great song but I believe it is from something else. I have "Luck of the Draw"
nett :)
It's how I live my life.......Give Them Something!! To Talk About....
MY SWEETHART!
yes she still is ..
my favorite Bonnie.
so do I.....
I love her.
Bonnie is a true gem! This was definitely the first song I ever heard of hers, but I have since fallen hard for the following, "Love me Like a Man"; "Mighty Tight Woman" and "Finest Lovin' Man".
Bonnie has ALWAYS been MY CRUSH ... erie how this message shows up here...

PLEASE DON'T READ THIS. YOU WILL BE KISSED ON THE NEAREST POSSIBLE FRIDAY BY THE LOVE OF YOUR LIFE.TOMORROW WILL BE THE BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE. NOW YOU'VE STARTED READING THIS. DON'T STOP. THIS IS SO FREAKY. 1. say your name 10 times 2. say your mom's name 5 times 3. say your crushes name 3 times 4. paste this to 4 other songs. if you do this, your crush will kiss you on the nearest Friday. but if you read this and do not paste this, then you will have very bad luck. SEND THIS TO 5 SONGS IN 143 MINUTES. WHEN YOU'RE DONE PRESS F6 AND YOUR CRUSH'S NAME WILL APPEAR IN BIG LETTERS ON THE SCREEN. THIS IS SO FREAKY BECAUSE IT ACTUALLY WORK :)
One of my all time greats.  Love her!
love her!
i love her bluesy sound
I love Bonnie, anything she does is great...............<3
my favourite voice in the universe ...
Bonnie Raitt looks weird on my playlist, but I love listening to her belt like this.
